dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 3034 : To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place for holding court for the Western District of Washington, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place for holding court for the Western District of Washington, and for other purposes.

section.header: Additional place for holding court for the Western District of Washington
section.text: Section 128(b) of title 28, United States Code, is amended by inserting Mount Vernon, after Tacoma,.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 19, 2022.
